# Button

Selector: `my-button`

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Button component

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                          | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot      | Description                                                                       |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|           | Button content                                                                    |
| `"start"` | Content is placed to the left of the button text in LTR, and to the right in RTL. |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                    | Description                            |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `--background`          | Background of the button               |
| `--background-disabled` | Background of the button when disabled |
| `--background-focus`    | Background of the button on focus      |
| `--background-hover`    | Background of the button on hover      |
| `--border-focus`        | Button border on focus                 |
| `--color`               | Button text color                      |
| `--color-disabled`      | Button text color when disabled        |
| `--color-focus`         | Button text color on focus             |
| `--color-hover`         | Button text color on hover             |
